name: Frozen Isolation
description:
Gather resources to resurrect plant and animal friends to help you gather and expand even more in this relaxing resource collection/automation game!

Made in 72 hours with the theme "Isolation"

1~2 hours to Red Panda

Controls: 

WASD to move

Shift to Run

Right click or Esc to open and close the menu

Fair Use:

Aside from the main character, I do not own any of the art or music used in this game.

Music: "Uniq - Art of Silence"
